text: The 2017 Mutua Madrid Open was a professional tennis tournament played on outdoor clay courts at the Park Manzanares in Madrid, Spain from 5 May–14 May 2017. It was the 16th edition of the event on the ATP World Tour and 9th on the WTA Tour.
